meanings.definition: The outer sole of a shoe or boot, typically made of a durable material such as rubber or leather.
meanings.sent1: The outsole of my sneaker was worn out from all the running.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the outsole of your hiking boots provides good traction on rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the outsole of every shoe in the house!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the outsole of her success, keeping her grounded and steady.
meanings.sent5: The outsole of the shoe felt like a sturdy foundation, supporting each step with confidence.
